Content:: Francisco Huerta Montalvo (18 June 1940 – 2 July 2022) was an Ecuadorian politician. A member of the Ecuadorian Radical Liberal Party and later the Democratic Party [es], he served as Minister of Government [es] from January to April 2000[1] and Minister of Public Health [es] from 1982 to 1983.[2] Huerta died of cardiac arrest in Guayaquil on 2 July 2022 at the age of 82.[3]  This article about an Ecuadorian politician is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
